name: auto-youtube-subscription-playlist-2
description: This is a Google Apps Script that automatically adds new Youtube videos to playlists (a replacement for Youtube Collections feature).

scripts.test: tmpfile=$(mktemp /tmp/XXXXXX) && clasp run Test | tee $tmpfile && grep 'All tests passed' $tmpfile &> /dev/null && if [ $? != 0 ]; then exit 1; fi
